post.body: thanxxx. Hopefully its not too bad.
'winter sun' by dishwalla? A personal fav.
that's all I gots.
how da fuck do I posta keep (my) piece (warm)!!
it'll go away if yo u don't encourage it!
it's 29 here and i'm afraid my testicles shall never descend again.
i'm still following you!
yay! Curves rock.
you just need more protein. Prolly about every three hours.
i'm amazed at how quickly my brain conjured that image. i'm sure you're on fiyah, kitten.
lol (srsly) at "bf units." just so you know, i'm totally stealing that.
Zac Posen (35) for the actual inauguration, and Zac Posen (17) for the ball afterwards. =) No more 1st ladies in OdelaR kthx
totes! Now I'm gonna go home and relax.
lol. Its was very very unpleasant. I don't wish it on anybody.
lol... i was there for 6 months. strangely, my TSH level is currently back to normal, after having had a hypER swing. strange, no?
thanks! :-D
surgical. Am sched for thyroidectomy on 29th but that could change. NEED DONE this month!
yah. I'm more worried about getting it done b4 Jan 1st.
they found cancer cells but she won't call it cancer. Either way its coming out.
I'm here... Waiting.
is that you in your new pic? what a stud.
thank you!
NOM!!1!
thank u!
thank you!
thank you!
o, i remembered :) it's a work paper i accidentally (maybe?) brought home and lost (maybe?). i dunno cuz i can't find it!
how?
balls out, betches! If u can't take the heat then get ur ass out the Oncology dept!
JELLUS!!1!
oh man. she's already had them and moved on. she's into BOYS now. *barf*
i'm scared i won't be able to continue losing weight without a thyroid!!1!
I think its just you.
that's what i do at work, tho. cydonia here i come!!1! you make me laugh.
nice PIE!
i'm totally going to upload pix of these pamphlets. i'll send you the link when i do!
I wouldve pushed his car - over his dead body.
lol... I peed on the one that fell in the urinal.
i'd say the fact that most of them are crap is what's limiting.
i know you didn't!
i'm sure they're going to love them :-)
you did come to my mind. :-)
k so i'm in love with him now. but do i have to hear him sing?
She wants to deliver the biopsy results in person. This means it's bad news. Tomm morning 8 o'clock.
Just got that dreaded call from the doctor. The one I was hoping I wouldn't get.
Just bcuz you have accumulated the ability to tolerate ur awful children doesn't mean any1 else in a 100 mile radius can. I am gonna kill...
great column by david brooks - http://tinyurl.com/5zjf6g
what i said about paul rudd? i meant that about gael garcia bernal.
Yay I'm done. That hurt but not as bad as I thought.
it is one of the most curable forms of cancer a person can get. possibly THE most.
you can laugh, btw. as i said to @michaelengle, i am not Sept. 12.
i am going to get away with SO MUCH!!1! you have no idea.
practicing... i have cancer and you want me to: WORK?!; BE RATIONAL?!; SHAVE?!; NOT KILL UR CHILDREN?!; CATER TO UR RETARDEDNESS?! OH SNAP!
oh hai I didn't want this thyroid anyway. Sigh.
Tick tock tick tock
wtf am i forgetting? it's keeping me awake.
the surgeon is nice, but has a horrific squinty prob with left eye. don't find that comforting. at least he does this 8 times a month, tho.
This dr's suite looks like 1987.
Boss took the news VERY well- same thing happened to him last year but for him it turned out not to be cancer.
uhm too cold for texans to go outside STATE HOLIDAY kthx!!1
this 76 degree weather is DECADENT.
Score for the niece at Macy's!!
70 degrees? GODZ I love global warming sometimes.
i would just like to state that i never thought it was "over" for britney. i did question if, after "B'Day", beyonc√© could bring it back.
making stuffed jalapenos? not the best idea. my tummy is having a logistical nightmare. #WTMI
stuffed jalapenos ready in a few. fingers, however, are already done. but they feel like they're still in the oven. #need_rubber_gloves
i have a 13 year old niece whom i want to shower with gifts, but i also have a budget and NO IDEA what to get for her. rackin' muh braynz.
Thank god for noise canceling headphones. This table of heifers beside me is barely noticeable!
I hate going out in public this time of year, except for all the hot gay guys I've seen today. NOM.
One day off for xmas? Oh hai I'm Uncle Scrooge.
Thanks for ripping out all my chest hair, EKG nurse.
At hospital for pre-op labs and registration. SO EXCITING.
Just stopped to help somebody push a car. Totally regretting it.
There are jesus pamphlets all over the work bathroom.
four years to the day, y'all! http://tinyurl.com/2xdppr
shaved muh headz LOLZERZ!!11
almost MIRACULOUS spiritual accessory! lol http://tinyurl.com/89m5aa
new rule: nuts are illegal. apparently i had a couple of cashews and they are killing me. KILLING ME!!1! plz cater 2 my allergies kthx.
